descriptions.description: The GNU Multiple Precision Arithmetic Library

GMP is a free library for arbitrary precision arithmetic, operating on signed integers, rational numbers, and floating point numbers. There is no practical limit to the precision except the ones implied by the available memory in the machine GMP runs on. GMP has a rich set of functions, and the functions have a regular interface. The main target applications for GMP are cryptography applications and research, Internet security applications, algebra systems, computational algebra research, etc.

flag.name: readline
flag.info: Needed for demo executable. --with-readline is optional, package is auto-detected.

set.commands:
PACKAGE_NAME=gmp PACKAGE_VERSION=5.1.3
oegextract ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}.tar.xz
oegimport readline
oeg_include_files AUTHORS COPYING* README
configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-gnu-ld --with-readline --disable-assembly --with-sysroot=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --bindir=${OEG_BASE_BIN_DIR} --libdir=${OEG_BASE_LIB_DIR} ${CONFIGURE_HOST_PARA} make #make check make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} # installs only static library. It's not possible to build both static and DLL, since gmp.h # is different for each (one define only). In configure --help both are marked as "default".
# Now we build the dynamic library. make clean configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-gnu-ld --with-readline --disable-assembly --with-sysroot=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --disable-static --enable-shared --bindir=${OEG_BASE_BIN_DIR} --libdir=${OEG_BASE_LIB_DIR} ${CONFIGURE_HOST_PARA} make make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}
cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" oeg_fix_path_names oeg_fix_libtool_file libgmp.la libgmp-10.dll libgmp.dll.a libgmp.a oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
